refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts one or more files to another format

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the &dhpackage; command.
&dhpackage; reads an input file and converts it to a new file with another format.
Supported input formats are CML, MDL Molfile, PDB, PMP, SHELX and XYZ. The input format is automatically detected.
Supported output formats are: cml, gin, mol, pdb, shelx, smi, svg and xyz.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para: The following options are currently supported:

listitem.para: Defines the output format to use. (See PARAMETERS)
Defines the level of customization of the file IO.
Lists the options of customization of the given file format.
Use a Java properties file to define the file IO option values.
Format can be one of following formats: cml|gin|mol|pdb|shelx|smi|svg|xyz.
